Replace.Text: 建造每种商业中心一级建筑各一个。
Build every type of Commercial Hub tier 1 building once.
建造每种商业中心二级建筑各一个。
Build every type of Commercial Hub tier 2 building once.
建造每种剧院广场一级建筑各一个。
Build every type of Theater tier 1 building once.
建造每种剧院广场二级建筑各一个。
Build every type of Theater tier 2 building once.
建造每种剧院广场三级建筑各一个。
Build every type of Theater tier 3 building once.
建造每种学院一级建筑各一个。
Build every type of Campus tier 1 building once.
建造每种学院二级建筑各一个。
Build every type of Campus tier 2 building once.
建造每种学院三级建筑各一个。
Build every type of Campus tier 3 building once.
建造5个商业中心。
Build 5 Commercial Hub Districts.
获得1位大音乐家。
Get a Great Musician.
获得1位大作家。
Get a Great Writer.
获得1位大艺术家。
Get a Great Artist.
获得1位大科学家。
Get a Great Scientist.
与森林相邻的森林+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力，与雨林相邻的雨林+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Forest that is adjacent to other forest. +1 [ICON_Food] Food for Jungle that is adjacent to other Jungle.
相同类型的区域相邻时额外+1相邻加成产出。
Extra +1 corresponding yield from adjacency of the same type of districts.
允许结盟。相同类型的区域相邻时额外+1相邻加成产出。
Allows Alliances. Extra +1 corresponding yield from adjacency of the same type of districts.
解锁航空母舰升级：超级航空母舰[NEWLINE]在友军领土之外恢复。
Unlocks aircraft carrier upgrade: SUPER CARRIER.
水运单位+1 [ICON_Movement] 移动力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]每2个相邻的渔场改良设施使渔场+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for embarked units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Fishery receives +1 [ICON_Gold] from each two adjacent Fisheries.
渔船改良设施+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]每个相邻的渔场改良设施使渔场+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Fishing boats. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Fishery receives +1 [ICON_Gold] from each adjacent Fishery.
矿山改良设施+1 [ICON_Science] 科技值。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]在地图上显示并允许开采 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] 铁资源。
+1 [ICON_Science] Science for Mines. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reveals and allows harvesting of [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron.
矿山改良设施+1 [ICON_Science] 科技值。
+1 [ICON_Science] Science for Mines.
矿山改良设施+1 [ICON_Science] 科技值。
+1 [ICON_Science] Science Production for Mines.
采石场改良设施+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。
+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for Quarries.
采石场改良设施+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。
+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for Quarries.
采石场改良设施+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。
+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for Quarries.
矿山和采石场改良设施+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]在地图上显示并允许收获 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] 石油资源。
+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Mines and Quarries. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reveals and allows harvesting of [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil.
每2个相邻的矿山改良设施使矿山+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Mine from every 2 adjacent Mines.
每个相邻的矿山改良设施使矿山+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]在地图上显示并允许收获 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤资源。
+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Mine from every adjacent Mine. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reveals and allows harvesting of [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal.
每2个相邻的采石场改良设施使采石场+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Quarry from every 2 adjacent Quarries.
每个相邻的采石场改良设施使采石场+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]建造者使用次数+1。
+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Quarry from every adjacent Quarry.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 charges for Builders.
每与一个牧场、种植园、营地相邻时，农场+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]每2个相邻的牧场改良设施使牧场+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
+1 [ICON_Food] for Farm from each Camp, Pasture, or Plantation it is adjacent to. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food for Pasture from every 2 adjacent Pastures.
每个相邻的牧场改良设施使牧场+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
+1 [ICON_Food] Food for Pasture from every adjacent Pasture.
每2个相邻的营地改良设施使营地+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]每2个相邻的种植园改良设施使种植园+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Camp from every 2 adjacent Camps.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Plantation from every 2 adjacent Plantations.
每个相邻的营地改良设施使营地+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Camp from every adjacent Camp.
每与1个资源相邻，商业中心区和港口区可获得+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币加成。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]每个相邻的种植园改良设施使种植园+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
+1 [ICON_Gold] gold for Commercial hub and Harbor when it is adjacent to each resource.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Plantation from every adjacent Plantation.
牧场改良设施+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Pastures.
牧场改良设施+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Pastures.
牧场改良设施+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Pastures.
种植园改良设施+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]在地图上显示并允许收获 [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] 铝资源。
+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Plantations. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reveals and allows harvesting of [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] Aluminum.
渔船改良设施+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。所有海军和水运单位可在海洋单元格上航行。
+1 [ICON_Food] Food for Fishing boats. All naval and embarked units can navigate Ocean tiles.
渔船改良设施+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
+1 [ICON_Food] Food for Fishing boats.
每2个相邻的渔船改良设施使渔船+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
+1 [ICON_Food] Food for Fishing Boat from every 2 adjacent Fishing Boats.
水运单位+2 [ICON_Movement] 移动力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]每个相邻的渔船改良设施使渔船+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for embarked units. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food for Fishing Boat from every adjacent Fishing Boat.
每2个相邻的伐木场改良设施使伐木场+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Lumber Mill from every 2 adjacent Lumber Mills.
每个相邻的伐木场改良设施使伐木场+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
>+1 [ICON_Production] Production for Lumber Mill from every adjacent Lumber Mill.
与地热裂缝，火山土，火山，礁石相邻时，学院获得 [ICON_Science] 科技值加成。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]每个相邻的农场改良设施使农场+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
Campus gets [ICON_Science] Science bonus when it is adjacent to Geothermal, Reef, Volcanic soil, and Volcano.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food for Farm from every adjacent Farm.

完成后，获得等同于其花费的 [ICON_Science] 科技值。
Grant [ICON_Science] Science equal to its cost upon completion.
